remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的任何現有事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]使用委派。No existing event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses the delegate. 這個類別中，輸入事件資料，輸入各種更特定事件資料類別的基底類別。The event data type for this class, , is the base class for various more specific event data classes for input. 定義通用不論裝置起始事件的輸入事件的事件資料屬性。 defines the event data properties of input events that are common regardless of the device that initiated the event. 使用委派的範例衍生的事件資料並對應至現有的輸入事件是。An example of a delegate that uses derived event data and that corresponds to an existing input event is .
